body: At 1st level, an urban barbarian gains a +1 bonus on attack rolls and a +1 dodge bonus to AC when adjacent to two or more enemies. In addition, her movement is not impeded by crowds, and she gains a bonus equal to 1/2 her barbarian level on Intimidate checks to influence crowds. This ability replaces fast movement.
name: Crowd Control
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Barbarian/Barbarian Archetypes/Urban Barbarian/Crowd Control
